titles: His Majesties gracious letter, directed to the presbytery of Edinburgh and by them to be communicated to the rest of the presbyteries of this kirk. Received the third of September, 1660.
author: Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
Lauderdale, John Maitland, Duke of, 1616-1682.
publisher: printed by Christopher Higgins, in [Harts] Close, over against the Trone Church,
notes: Signed "Lauderdail" (i.e. John Maitland, Duke of Lauderdale) and dated at end: Whitehall, the 10. of August, 1660.
Arms 223; Steele notation: this  from  farewell.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C.
